recipesJson.name: Bolena
recipesJson.author: NaCHeF
recipesJson.description:
This is my take on a very popular profile but with a twist on the custard and coconut.

I think this is perfect for those looking for a strawberry milkshake/cheesecake with a rich creamy base and something new without being too sweet or dense, perfect for an ADV.

Inspirated by: Stroconut by @MuuMuu || God Milk by @SkiddlzNinja || Mother of Dragon's Milk by @ID10-T || Sweet Strawberry Cream by @CheebaSteeba || and all the mother's milk, unicorn milk and boosted clones.

reviews.text: This is a very tasty mix. I love how the coconut brings a rich sweetness to the strawberries. I didn't let it steep but it was very good on the shake and I am sure will get even better with a steep. Nice Job!
